text: The COVID-19 pandemic was confirmed to have reached Cyprus in March 2020. On 9 March 2020, Cyprus confirmed its first two cases: a 25-year-old man from Limassol who had returned from Italy and a 64-year-old health professional from Nicosia who had returned from the UK. On 21 March, the first death was confirmed. On 30 April, 7 new cases were confirmed. According to the updated statistics released by the Ministry of Health, a total of 296 people have recovered. ==References== Category:History of Cyprus Cyprus
title: COVID-19 pandemic in Cyprus
